name: Food Shortage
description: Spoilage, treachery, or bad luck has caused a food shortage this turn.

criticalSuccess.msg: Through careful rationing, you manage to get through the shortage without harm.

success.msg: Your shortages are manageable, with some workers going hungry. @gain1ConsumptionNextTurn Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:6]. On a failure, this event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

failure.msg: The shortages are severe. @gainMultiple1ConsumptionNextTurn per Settlement. Attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:16]. On a failure, this event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).

criticalFailure.msg: The shortages are catastrophic. @gain2Unrest and @gain1Strife, and your @gainMultiple1ConsumptionNextTurn per Settlement. This event reoccurs next turn (in addition to any other event that would occur).
